overview:
Following a 21-year banking career with the Bank of England, FSA, Bank of Bermuda, and HSBC, Graham Easton founded UK company VREGlobal Ltd, now Internet Search Marketing Ltd. ISM is a leader in providing geo-targeted search engine optimization (SEO) solutions to small- and medium-sized businesses in the UK.

Teaming up with David Leppan in 2008, Mr. Easton went on to co-found and develop TravelShark Pte Ltd, which is the largest provider of travel and hospitality websites in the world.

Graham Easton is a director of both companies, and is Chief Operating Officer and the lead SEO at TravelShark.
